name: Heroes of Midgard
overview: On an alternate world, where myth and reality collide … The peaceful nation of Malexheim has been invaded by the monstrous legions of Hel, goddess of death and war. Though vastly outnumbered, the brave citizens raise an army to repel this abominable incursion, and then to advance into the foul region of Niflheim and strike at the very heart of Hel’s empire. Released as part of the Sideways SEUCK Compo 2011.
